Title: Ordinary worker
Publisher: Tianjinshi weisheng xuanchuan jiaoyusuo (天津市卫生宣传教育所)
Notes: Hua Guofeng as ordinary worker in a department store - not a role Mao would have been pictured in. Hua wants to show he will "serve the people", as the sign in the top right corner says (为人民服务 - Wei renmin fuwu).
